bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names tong se 痛澀.
a) pain in the eyes and/or face accompanied by a feeling of dryness and the presence of a foreign body. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 26: 其根主目澀痛 , “The root controls rough ness with pain in the eyes”.

b) Pain in the urinary tract accompanied by difficulties in passing urine. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 5: 患小便不通，欲小便則澀痛不出 , “[Patients] suffer from anuria. If they intend to pass urine, they feel roughness with pain , and it does not leave”.
